scaled_with_ap: The ability’s effectiveness scales with Ability Power (AP).
scaled_with_ad: The ability’s effectiveness scales with Attack Damage (AD).
scaled_with_max_health: The ability’s effectiveness scales with the target’s maximum health.
scaled_with_missing_health: The ability’s effectiveness scales with the target’s missing health.
scaled_with_current_health: The ability’s effectiveness scales with the target’s current health.
scaled_with_mana: The ability’s effectiveness scales with the champion's Mana.
scaled_with_armor: The ability’s effectiveness scales with the champion's Armor.
scaled_with_mr: The ability’s effectiveness scales with the champion's Magic Resist.
scaled_with_movespeed: The ability’s effectiveness scales with the champion’s Movement Speed.
scaled_with_crit: The ability’s effectiveness scales with Critical Strike Chance or Damage.
scaled_with_bonus_ad: The ability scales with bonus Attack Damage.
scaled_with_bonus_health: The ability scales with bonus health (health from items, runes, etc.).
deals_true_damage: The ability deals true damage, ignoring resistances.
